overview: Sweet, delicious, desirable, and ready to melt in your mouth... It's Candy Evans...  And what Candy wants... Candy gets. Every luscious curve, every inch of smooth satin skin, every hint of sensuality is explored as Tastes Like Candy holds nothing back.  Finally, the screen is hers. And you are invited to the sexual event of the decade... As Candy Evans is totally revealed before your very eyes. Superstuds give her their all and she responds with raw uninhibited lust. Beautiful Babes go at it like they have never tasted Candy before... Take a trip to the outer limits of sensuality. From the pages of Hustler and other top men's magazines, Candy comes to life. Just one look will drive you crazy with desire.
title: Tastes Like Candy
